title: ConfigMaps and Secrets
description: Manage application configuration and sensitive data in Kubernetes
objective: Create a ConfigMap and Secret, then mount them in a pod
hints: Use 'kubectl create configmap' to create configuration data
Use 'kubectl create secret generic' for sensitive data
Mount ConfigMaps as volumes or environment variables
solution: kubectl create configmap app-config --from-literal=app.mode=production && kubectl create secret generic db-secret --from-literal=password=secret123
